author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
It's going on 5 months since we last heard a peep out of the COSMIC desktop project with alpha 7 being the last tagged release, there was supposed to be a beta and a full release by now, but what happened to that, and is it ever going to come out.
